Bitcoin is again trading below the psychological $30k threshold after a strong push over the past week.
The post Bitcoin and Ethereum drifting sideways as fears over Shanghai upgrade are yet to play out appeared first on CityAM.
articles.content:
Tuesday 18 April 2023 11:06 am
Bitcoin is again trading below the psychological $30k threshold after a strong push over the past week. The dip comes as investors have shied away from riskier assets,… [+5065 chars]
